name: Salvage City
description:
After the collapse of the human world, the Scrap Worms came up from the wreckage to harvest the buildings that remained.

Harvest buildings and then repurpose them to build your own city out of the rubble.

CONTROLS

  •  Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Placing Buildings - Space or Enter

Made by StormCat for the 52nd Ludum Dare Jam.
